titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Earl of Kent, lord chamberlain of Her Majesties houshold, &c. This poem is humbly address'd, by your lordship's most obedient and most humble servant. Mary Pix.
titleStmt.author: Pix, Mary, 1666-1720.

notesStmt.note: Title page in the form of a dedication.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
